metadata.title: CVE-2019-6956 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.8.It is a buffer over-read in ps_mix_phase in libfaad/ps_dec.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6956` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

faad - 2.8.8-3.2
libfaad2 - 2.8.8-3.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: faad2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.8-3.2').
